entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 03 February 2023
